description: From Middle English blewissh, blewisch (also Middle English bloysh), equivalent to blue +â€Ž -ish.

adjectives.description: bluish (comparative more bluish, superlative most bluish)

entries.meaning: Having a tint or hue similar to the colour blue.

examples: To this day, I usually read my Bible a couple of times a day, and I still enjoy attempting to express my feelings through poetry, especially when I'm feeling bluish.
